meanings.definition: A dish of baked food, typically with a browned crust on top.
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious gratins for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The gratins at the restaurant were cheesy and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The gratins were so good, they disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The golden crust on the gratins reminded me of a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the gratins baking in the oven filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The crust formed on food that has been baked or broiled.
meanings.sent1: I love the crispy gratins on top of lasagna.
meanings.sent2: The gratins on the apple pie were perfectly browned.
meanings.sent3: The gratins on the cookies were like tiny edible shields.
meanings.sent4: The gratins on the roast chicken looked like a crunchy crown.
meanings.sent5: The gratins on the bread gave it a delightful crunch.
